ing: 2 (16 ounce) packages frozen cut green beans, thawed
des: "Creamy skillet green beans are a staple side dish for any family dinner."
ins: Melt margarine in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion until tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans, salt, and pepper; cook until heated through, 7 to 10 minutes. Serve with sour cream and sprinkle with paprika.
